l2.example.intro: Compare forms: which one reveals the needed feature fastest?
l2.formMatch.vertex.context: Projectile path: report the maximum height and the x-value where it happens.
l2.formMatch.vertex.why: Vertex form makes (h, k) explicit; h is the x-value at the peak, k the height.
l2.formMatch.intercept.context: Break-even: when does profit hit zero?
l2.formMatch.intercept.why: Intercept form exposes the zeros directly.
l2.formMatch.standard.context: Compare or combine coefficients across models.
l2.formMatch.standard.why: Standard form keeps a, b, c visible.
